---
title: "If statements"
---

```{r}
a <- 1  
b <- 2

if (a > b) {
    print("a > b")
} else if (a == b) {
    print ("a = b")
} else {
    print("a < b")
}
```

Relational and logical operators:

|    |        |
|----|--------|
| != | Not equal to |
| &  | AND          |
| \| | OR           |
| !  | NOT          |
| | |
